## ITextEmbeddable interface

Interface for objects that can be embedded in messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ITextEmbeddable 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [renderTextEmbed(ctx)](./bge-core.itextembeddable.rendertextembed.md) | Renders the object for embedding in text. |
